description: Detects PsExec service installation and execution events (service and Sysmon) Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Hacktool Service Registration or Execution
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND (Provider_Name:"Service\ Control\ Manager" AND winlog.event_id:("7045" OR "7036")) AND (winlog.event_data.ServiceName:(*WCESERVICE* OR *WCE\ SERVICE* OR *winexesvc* OR *DumpSvc* OR *pwdump* OR *gsecdump* OR *cachedump*) OR winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*bypass*))
